title: TON Blockchain Hits New All-Time High
body: The TON blockchain reached a new all-time high in daily transactions, marking a significant milestone for the network and its growing ecosystem.
summary: TON blockchain breaks records with daily transactions.

title: Ethereum Gas Fees Drop to 2023 Levels
body: Ethereum users are celebrating as gas fees return to levels not seen since 2023, making transactions more affordable for everyone.
summary: ETH gas fees hit a two-year low.

title: Crypto Project Launches Telegram Mini App
body: A new Telegram Mini App aims to make crypto onboarding easier than ever, integrating wallet creation and token swaps directly in chat.
summary: New Mini App simplifies crypto onboarding.
